cvv_info: FR_This is a 3 or 4 digit security code found on the back of you card.
sure_delete: FR_Are you sure you want to delete this payment option?
add_new_payment_method_proceed: FR_Add a new payment method to proceed with the transaction
please_wait: FR_Please wait while we confirm payment
amount_exceeds_limit_text: FR_The amount to pay exceeds the daily transaction limit for M-PESA. You can choose another payment option to continue.
in_order_to_verify: FR_In order to verify your card details, we will charge a small fee of KES 5.00 and refund your card within 15 days.
card_declined: FR_Your card issuer has declined this transaction. Contact your bank or card issuer for more information.
card_details_added: FR_Card details added and selected for payment.
failed_to_collect_card_details: FR_Failed to collect card details. Please try again
whenever_choose_mpesa: FR_Whenever you choose to pay with M-Pesa, you will be requested to provide a phone number during payment.
mpesa_added: FR_M-PESA option added and selected for payment.
failed_to_charge_card: FR_Failed to charge card. Please try again.
unavailable: FR_Unavailable. Amount exceeds daily transaction limit
select_lipa_na_mpesa: FR_Select Lipa na M-PESA > Pay Bill
enter_mpesa_pin: FR_Enter your M-PESA PIN and click OK to send
confirmation_from_mpesa: FR_Youâ€™ll receive a confirmation SMS from M-PESA
mpesa_option_added: FR_M-PESA option added and selected for payment.
mpesa_prompt: FR_You'll receive a prompt to enter your M-PESA PIN
unable_to_send_mpesa_request: FR_We are unable to send an M-PESA payment request to your phone. You can still complete your payment with M-PESA Pay Bill
failed_to_charge_using_mpesa: FR_Failed to charge using Mpesa. Please try again.
unable_to_confirm_mpesa: FR_We are unable to confirm your M-PESA payment. Please retry again after a couple of minutes.
